channel.title: 667 Mac Client
channel.description:
Hello,
I am currently hosting a 667/725 off my Windows 7. A player told me that it doesn't work for Mac. Does anyone know how to add cache path for both Windows and Mac to my 667 client. Something like that checks the OS and uses that path.
Thanks and will Rep++ or Thanks :)

item.title: 667 Mac Client
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Every 667 client works for every computer.

Read full topic
